data.message: Eminem have listened to his tune and voted for NASAAN, it's real fresh... You trust in him, he'll make it!!!

replies.message: That's not entirely true.  Look what happened to D12.  Bizzy is so hard up that he's on FB asking for money to guest verse.  Em recently signed 2 other people too, I can't even remember their names.  Eminem needs to be heavily featured in a song or album for them to gain enough traction to be widely recieved.  Unless they're as good or almost as good, his name alone is not enough to attract enough people to make it big.

Yes what you just said is true, here's hoping, Eminem its time for you to drop another album featuring all these up and coming artists get them out there globally!!!! I'm dien for a new album, a world tour 😁
